text: Maggie Roswell (born November 14, 1952) is an American actress. She got both an Annie Award and an Emmy Award. She voiced the characters Maude Flanders, Miss Hoover and Helen Lovejoy in the animated series The Simpsons. She got her acting break during the 1980s in movies including Lost in America and Pretty in Pink. The actress was born in Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Annie Award winners
title: Maggie Roswell
